tool.name: docs-as-code
tool.desc: Automatically propagate UI text changes to documentation

tool.name: jekyll-github-starter-pack
tool.desc: Build a website in minutes on GitHub by using Jekyll's support of Liquid variables and templates

tool.name: linkchecker-third-twin
tool.desc: Scan a directory recursively to identify duplicate, triplicate, or n-cate topic-to-topic links in DITA files

tool.name: orphan-scan
tool.desc: Identify files that are not referenced by any DITA file in a specified directory, recursively

tool.name: word-list-scan
tool.desc: Scan all DITA files in a directory recursively for occurences of an entire list of words and phrases
